verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and with him <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%> And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and to <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7223>foremost,<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H314>after,<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H314>last.<s%>

And he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> him, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him: and they <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H3206>children;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> are <S%H428>those<s%> with you? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2603>graciously<s%> <S%H2603>given<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
Then the <S%H8198>handmaidens<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> they and their <S%H3206>children,<s%> and they <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> with her <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves: and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and they <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> mean you by <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4264>drove<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6298>met?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> These are to <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> my <S%H251>brother;<s%> <S%H1961>keep<s%> that you have to yourself.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H408>No,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H4503>present<s%> at my <S%H3027>hand:<s%> for <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> as though I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and you were <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with me.

<S%H3947>Take,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> that is <S%H935>brought<s%> to you; <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has dealt <S%H2603>graciously<s%> with me, and <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H3605>enough.<s%> And he <S%H6484>urged<s%> him, and he <S%H3947>took<s%> it.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us take our <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go,<s%> and I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that the <S%H3206>children<s%> are <S%H7390>tender,<s%> and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> with <S%H5763>young<s%> are with me: and <S%H518>if<s%> men should <S%H1849>overdrive<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Let my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servant:<s%> and I will <S%H5095>lead<s%> on <S%H328>softly,<s%> <S%H7272>according<s%> as the <S%H4399>cattle<s%> that goes <S%H6440>before<s%> me and the <S%H3206>children<s%> be <S%H7272>able<s%> to <S%H7272>endure,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H3322>leave<s%> with you some of the <S%H5971>folk<s%> that are with me. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> needs it? let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> him an <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5521>booths<s%> for his <S%H4735>cattle:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8003>Shalem,<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Padanaram;<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> his tent <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And he <S%H7069>bought<s%> a <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of a <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he had <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>money.<s%>
And he <S%H5324>erected<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it Elelohe <S%H415>Israel.<s%>
